頩字的基本解释

頩
pīng
光润而美的样子。

頩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pīng］
［《廣韻》普丁切，平青，滂。］
亦作“艵1”。
面色光润。
[②]［pǐng］
［《廣韻》匹迥切，上迥，滂。］
愤怒变色貌。

頩字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頩； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1403第20
【廣韻】普丁切【集韻】【韻會】傍丁切，?音竮。【廣韻】面色。【博雅】艴頩，色也。【宋玉·神女賦】頩薄怒以自持兮，曾不可乎犯干。【註】頩，怒色靑貌。　又【楚辭·遠遊】玉色頩以滿顏。【註】盛氣貌。　又【廣韻】匹迥切【集韻】【韻會】普迥切，?聘上聲。【說文】縹色也。本作艵。　又【廣韻】斂容也。艴字原从弗从頁作。

【正字通】頩本字。頩字从幷作。
頩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
頩字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
頩
pīng
Smooth and beautiful look.
頩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pīng］
["Guang Yun" Pu Ding cut, flat green, peng. ]
Also known as "艵1".
The complexion is radiant.
[②]［pǐng］
["Guangyun" The horses are very cut, on the top, and piercing. ]
Angry discoloration.

[Guang Yun] Pu Ding Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ping Ding Cut,? Yin 竮. [Guang Yun] complexion. [Bo Ya] The color is also beautiful. [Song Yu·Goddess' Poetry] He was so angry that he was self-sufficient, and he was never allowed to commit a crime. [Note] 頩, angry and beautiful appearance.　[Chu Ci·Yuanyou] The jade color is full of beauty. [Note] pompous appearance.　[Guangyun] The horse is very cut [Jiyun] [The Yunhui] The general is cut,? Hire. [Said the text] The color is also. This is a lao.　[Guang Yun] Convergence. The word "Fu" was originally written by Fu from the page. 【Zhengzitong】The original character. The words are written from the same name.
